effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.legends-arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.sword-shield: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.sword-shield: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
